column2: Down train to Acton Wells Junction

column1: EA1370 GOSPEL OAK TO BARKING TILBURY LINE JUNCTION WEST

For ARS regulating purposes, in the Westbound direction and so as not to block the London Overground servicesin the Bay platform at Gospel Oak ARR and DEP times with activities A and * to be used and not pathing time
Up T&H Line (Westbound) towards Gospel Oak standing at Gospel Oak Signal NL1306

Trains longer than 84 SLUs stopped at Gospel Oak Signal NL1306 will foul Junction Road Junction. In thiscircumstance junction margin and headway at Junction Road Junction applies between the departure time for thefirst train departing Gospel Oak Signal NL1306 and the passing time of the second train at Junction RoadJunction.
A train cannot be allowed on to the chord line whilst a train on the Down (Eastbound) T&H line is approachingSouth Tottenham
